metadata.name: PUA - NSudo Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of NSudo tool for command execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nsudo.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nsudolc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\nsudolg.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('nsudo\.exe', 'nsudolc\.exe', 'nsudolg\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u:s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u:t ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u:e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-p:e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m:s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m:h ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u=s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u=t ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u=e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-p=e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m=s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-m=h ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-showwindowmode:hide'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of NSudo tool for command execution

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use by administrators References: https://web.archive.org/web/20221019044836/https://nsudo.m2team.org/en-us/, https://www.winhelponline.com/blog/run-program-as-system-localsystem-account-windows/
